name: Cube Invasion (Early Acces)
description:
Goal of game: You are a flying drone. And defend your maker.

Story line: The enemys are CUBES. They are made by an alien species. And they where fascinated by our geometrical cubes.

Buy SOFTWARE UPDATES to shoot laser, explosive barrels and more.

This game is still being worked on.

There are much glitches going on. But most are fixed.

This game is very bad for now. But ok.
